ComicInfo.Summary:
Meet Vampblade, other-dimensional vampire slayer and… the new QUEEN OF HELL!!!!??
Features 3 regular and risqué variants, including two covers from Dan Mendoza (Zombie Tramp, DollFace)!!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------------------------|---------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Marcelo Costa | 1 | | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marcelo Costa | 2 | | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Mastajwood | 3 | | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Mastajwood | 4 | | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Dan Mendoza | 5 | | F | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Dan Mendoza | 6 |
*Notes* Overall issue #33. The digital edition (11/28/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Title: Queen of Hell Part Four
